{"id":1319316966,"question_id":10,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1720848648,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1319316966/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Regular Expression Matching","memory":"10 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        int m = p.size();\n        vector<vector<bool>> dp(n + 1, vector<bool>(m + 1, false));\n        \n        dp[0][0] = true;\n        \n        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n            if (p[j-1] == '*') {\n                dp[0][j] = dp[0][j-2];\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n            for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n                if (p[j-1] == '*') {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-2]; \n                    if (p[j-2] == '.' || p[j-2] == s[i-1]) {\n                        dp[i][j] = dp[i][j] || dp[i-1][j]; \n                    }\n                } else if (p[j-1] == '.' || p[j-1] == s[i-1]) {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"regular-expression-matching","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
